title: Bug 56779[ajdoc] add ajdoc support for intertype declarations and other declare forms
description: Bug 56779[ajdoc] add ajdoc support for intertype declarations and other declare forms
OB: Currently ajdoc only exposes the "Advises" and "Advised by" relationships fromthe structure model.It needs to support intertype field and member declarations using a UIsimilar to how Javadoc presents inherited members.It also needs to support the other declare forms: error, warning, soft,parents, and precedence.
